thought: To craft polished_blackstone_bricks, I first need to craft polished_blackstone. Polished_blackstone requires placing 4 blackstone side by side in the crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move the blackstone from slot 38 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1
